title: #1535 It Wasn't The Headboard
itunes:title: #1535 It Wasn't The Headboard
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing Hanna Barbara shows from days past and go on to discuss some of the recent celebrities who have suffered scary medical scares. They also speak to a caller who has identified a new measurement for sound that he want's Ace's take on. Later they turn back to to the topic of recent scary falls as they discuss Bob Saget and review the video of Heather McDonald's scary fall as well.

Please Support Our Sponsors:

Geico.com
